Articles.Content:
> 
> ANd riot.. AND. It cannot be stopped now, we're past the point of no return~

XNOR riot
we are going to slow i can keep up with the speed and thats not good i should hit f5 and get 5 pages lets go people

last minute news!

![i8xTDWA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/i8xTDWA.jpg)!!

![Z2JsxJf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Z2JsxJf.jpg)<< WE want more snacks!!

![JAnqtDu.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JAnqtDu.jpg)<< UUUuuuuuuh!!!
About 10% of my all-time posts are in this thread. I regret nothing.
9 minutes! *Possibly*

> 
> Admins are removing nonessential functions so the hype may flow.

It'is just like that pub: "remove anything except my... HYYYPEEE"

> 
> Dear Squad, we are sorry for burning down the servers.....
> But realy, post some statistics. I'd love to see the damage we delt

Yes, we need dat server killmail ;D

> 
> We're HYPEing non-stop!
> I just saw the engineer throw the brake handle out the window!

That was me. *Engineer* of Stuff.
More teasing.

> 
> Ok nvm that. I'm just getting angry with all those 502's in main forum page. Yeah I know steam auto update, mass hype, and prolly mass download fail after release. That makes me really sad when I think of it. Happycat has run out of happy...

Steam is the way forward. Also, fair enough.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/14cgH6MiYf8?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

"Is it really that time again?"

If it doesn't come out at 6PM.

FULL DDOS DRIVE, HYPE ENGAGE
this thread just went PLAID!
Quick everyone! We may have only 10 minutes to prove we're twice as hyped as we've ever been before! You know what you have to do. Make it so!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ijnJ7XdOk_A?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

HYpe train is passing at hype town
Xl booster stage activated, hold on to your hats!!!! And anything you dont want falling off

> 
> About 10% of my all-time posts are in this thread. I regret nothing.

About 90% of all my posts are in this thread.
So what are we doing for 1.1

> 
> Wait, what? Screw this, I'm off to watch SpaceX!

The tales mission is in 5+ hours. Small chance squad might release earlier than that. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
I sense the hype is strong with you... Powerful thread it will become.
[pants wetting intensifies]

> 
> No no no no,you've got it all wrong! You have to put the LFE-SPRT on standby first THEN remove the hypelithium crystals! You trying to get us all killed?!

Well, I thought the expanding cloud of gas bit was pretty clear... :S

I don't think it will matter if we die while we die (except to Xzibit perhaps)
hype beat the previous hype hype

> 
> Indeed it was until today. We shattered it and we are still trucking

cCHUGGA CHUGGA
